system.descriptionText:
1. Creed (200xp): Gain Charm and Common Lore (Imperial Creed) as Trained Skills. Gain Inspire Wrath Talent.
2. Duty (100xp): +3 Willpower. Gain either Armour of Contempt Talent or Unshakable Faith Talent.
3. Loyalty (100xp): Gain Trade (Voidfarer) as Trained Basic Skill, gain +5 to Willpower and Fellowship Tests aboard the ship your character lives on.
